author: David Wang
title: Hack Club BINJ reached 18 signups!! ðŸ¥³ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽŠ
content:
I can't believe this - our club actually reached the maximum number of signups!!

Initially Mr. Cloete and I set the limit at 12, thinking we wouldn't get more than that many people. However, we actually went above and beyond! I had to contact Mr. Victor Tong to update the limit to 18.

Our first meeting is on Wednesday. Can't wait to see y'all there!
